Title: Liuxian Teahouse
Text:
[Seasonal Picks]
Carefully selected Spring Tea, paired with "Lotus Top Morning Dew", known for its calming and soothing effects. Feel free to come in and enjoy our tea.

[Reminder]
The cute cats and dogs outside the teahouse are not just visitors; they are cherished members of our teahouse family. Guests are invited to interact with and treat them kindly. For those with sensitivities to our furry friends, we recommend the serene terrace on the second floor. From there, you can bask in the breathtaking view of Jinzhou and embrace the delightful atmosphere of the city.

[Now Hiring]
Tea for refreshment and tea for kindred spirits. Liuxian Teahouse is now hiring tea enthusiasts to join our team, and salary is negotiable.
